amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit gas produced under new leases authorized by this legislation from being exported to foreign countries.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part C of House Report 112-616 to prohibit gas produced under new leases authorized by this legislation from being exported to foreign countries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 262 (Roll no. 505).
